### Lognormal Distribution 

<h4> Lognormal Distribution  </h4> 


The normal 90th, 95th and 99th percentiles are:

*  $\mu+z_{0.90} \cdot \sigma$
*  $\mu+z_{0.95} \cdot \sigma$
*  $\mu+z_{0.99} \cdot \sigma$


where $z_{0.90}$ is the 90th percentile of the standard normal distribution, etc. 
The lognormal percentiles are obtained by raising e to the normal percentiles.
